CustomField.description: Select the reward option Movie ticket only will assign 2 movie tickets per 10 members on the contact for movie ticket Gift card only will assign 1 gift card per 10 members on the contact for gift card Both will assign 2 movie tickets to the contact for movie ticket for the first 10 members and assign 1 gift card to the contact for gift card for the next 10 members, and so on.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Movie ticket only will assign 2 movie tickets per 10 members for movie ticket contact Gift card only will assign 1 gift card per 10 members on the gift card contact Both will assign 2 movie tickets for first 10 members and 1 gift card to the next 10.
CustomField.label: Reward option
